/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of red and white, stand tall and proud, their facades adorned with balconies and awnings. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the cityscape. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene.
